Package roborally.game.structure

Class Round

  • java.lang.Object
    • roborally.game.structure.Round
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRound
    public class Round
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRound
    This class initializes the round system in the game. Practically it is created once, and then called on to run multiple times to keep the game going. Creates a new Phase to handle the phase system of the game. A round consists of five phases handled in startPhases(roborally.gameview.layout.ILayers)
